scripts.compile:app:dev: webpack --config ./webpack.config.js --define process.env.NODE_ENV='"dev"'       && npm run copyfile && npm run makePackage -- dev
scripts.compile:app:demo:real: webpack --config ./webpack.config.js --define process.env.NODE_ENV='"demo:real"' && npm run copyfile && npm run makePackage -- demo
scripts.compile:app:demo:stg: webpack --config ./webpack.config.js --define process.env.NODE_ENV='"demo:stg"'  && npm run copyfile && npm run makePackage -- demo_stg
scripts.compile:app:prod:real: webpack --config ./webpack.config.js --define process.env.NODE_ENV='"prod:real"' && npm run copyfile && npm run makePackage -- prod
scripts.compile:app:prod:stg: webpack --config ./webpack.config.js --define process.env.NODE_ENV='"prod:stg"'  && npm run copyfile && npm run makePackage -- prod_stg
scripts.build:dev: npm run compile:app:dev && npm run compile:www:prod
scripts.build:dev:aot: npm run compile:app:dev && npm run compile:www:prod:aot
scripts.build:demo:real: npm run compile:app:demo:real && npm run compile:www:demo:aot
scripts.build:demo:stg: npm run compile:app:demo:stg  && npm run compile:www:demo:aot
scripts.build:prod:real: npm run compile:app:prod:real && npm run compile:www:prod:aot
scripts.build:prod:stg: npm run compile:app:prod:stg  && npm run compile:www:prod:aot
scripts.start: npm run build:dev && npm run electron:start
